title: This is not LCS -_-
body: im meeting more and more players who expect you to play on some LCS God level every game. Getting cursed out and reported for having a bad game or two.  Especially ranked, i fear playing jg ranked because even if you hit every lane in an attempt to be in the game, you'll be a victim of all caps from someone. Rarely is it ever smooth within the team, sometimes it happens.

replies.body: "A victim of all caps" lol.  What's next, a victim of angry punctuation?
I can't help it, I snorted at this one.  And promptly imagined angry ellipses. You naughty _**. . .**_ you.
What else did you expect from the sign that's always having a threesome?

> [{quoted}](name=Azrael IV,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=gIbNAXE9,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-04-16T01:35:50.208+0000)
you'll be a victim of all caps from someone.

And they say that millennials are wimps...

Mute people. It's what I do. I have bot lane rage at me all the time because if you are slamming your lane under their own turret while they are full hp and you are half and you don't ward. Hell no I'm not coming down there. I'm going to the two lanes that are easy to gank and have the oppurtunity to take turret right after. 

My common thing I hear from bot lane is, "You have no presense! You don't gank at all!!!!!" MEanwhile scoreline is most of the time in the range of 3-1-2. Top turret gone. And rotations starting.

Jungle is the absolute worst role for avoiding flame.

Bot lane is 0/5? Your fault. No ganks.
Running into the lane as your laner dies? Your fault. No help.
Enemy team does damage beyond Smite range? Your fault. Why didn't you Smite?

These people are an absolute joke, and should be made to autofill Jungle for 20 games.

I agree I main JG more recently and IMHO and playing since end of first season IT IS THE MOST RESPONSIBLE and sometimes the hardest position to play. I Assure you all JG is gonna get it with those bullying CAPITALIZED words!!!!!!! oh yeah and those evil menacing EXCLAMATION POINTS

Unoriginal suggestion: mute them. 

But seriously though I know your feeling. I dont consider myself a good jg, heck I only play irelia jg and Im mediocre, but it is not just the jg responsibility to be in a lane at all times. People forget you need to farm also. On top of them bot lane has the biggest possibility of surviving ganks since there are two people. 

I think people just need to actually try more than two lanes and three characters to know what to expect. They dont understand.
It's not LCS but please don't play an off meta pick and go 4/14. It just doesn't look like you tried at all then.

Everyone expects there teammates to be as good as they are. So if they do well and the others don't they rage.

Idk, I don't rage at anyone lol, its a game. I understand we all have bad games.
